title: DiVa-360: The Dynamic Visual Dataset for Immersive Neural Fields
abstract: arXiv:2307.16897v2 Announce Type: replace-cross  Abstract: Advances in neural fields are enabling high-fidelity capture of the shape and appearance of dynamic 3D scenes. However, their capabilities lag behind those offered by conventional representations such as 2D videos because of algorithmic challenges and the lack of large-scale multi-view real-world datasets. We address the dataset limitation with DiVa-360, a real-world 360 dynamic visual dataset that contains synchronized high-resolution and long-duration multi-view video sequences of table-scale scenes captured using a customized low-cost system with 53 cameras. It contains 21 object-centric sequences categorized by different motion types, 25 intricate hand-object interaction sequences, and 8 long-duration sequences for a total of 17.4 M image frames. translated_title: DiVa-360：沉浸式神经场动态视觉数据集
translated_abstract: 神经场技术的进步使得动态3D场景的形状和外观能够以高保真度被捕捉。然而，由于算法挑战和缺乏大规模多视角真实世界数据集，其性能仍落后于传统的2D视频表示。我们通过DiVa-360解决了数据集限制，这是一个包含同步的高分辨率长时间多视角视频序列的实时360度动态视觉数据集，捕捉了使用53台摄像机的定制低成本系统记录的台式场景。该数据集包含21个物体为中心的序列，按不同运动类型分类，25个复杂的手-物体交互序列和8个长时间序列，共计1740万帧图像。此外，我们提供前景-背景分割掩模、同步音频和文本描述。我们在DiVa上对最先进的动态神经场方法进行了基准测试。
tldr: 这个数据集DiVa-360提供了沉浸式360度动态视觉数据，解决了缺乏大规模多视角真实世界数据集的问题，为动态神经场方法的研究和发展提供了重要资源。
